availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Greenup County, Kentucky native. Married to Mary Ann Osborn McGlone in 1834. Father of Cordelia McGlone, James McGlone, William McGlone, Mary McGlone, Eliza McGlone, Patrick Henry McGlone, Melinda McGlone, and Angeline McGlone. Resident of Carter County in 1840. Farmer in Carter County in 1850. Farmer in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 255
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 2, p. 231A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 158.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, Precinct 2, p. 104A-104B.
Robert E. McGlone and Thomas H. McGlone, The McGlones: A Series on the McGlone Name as Researched in the United States, (McGlone and Associates, 1980), p. 88.
